titleStmt.title: Tirumaṅkalam, X temple, time of X, year X

licence.p: This work is licenced under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

handDesc.p: No distinction between e and ē, nor between o and ō.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

div.p:
s=vas=ti ś=rī [||*] tirumakaḷ pola peruni
laccevviyun=taṉakkeyurimai pūṇ
ṭamai maṉakkoḷakkān=talūrcālai kalamaṟu
taruḷi veṅkaiṉāṭuṅkeṅkapāṭiyunu
ḷampapāṭiyum taṭikaivaḻiyum kuṭamalai
ṉāṭun=taṇṭāl koṇṭa taṉṉeḻi
l vaḷarūḻi yāṇṭil Ellā yāṇṭu
toḻutakai yāṇṭe ceḻiyarai tecukoḷ
ś=rīkovirājarājarājakecaripan=maṟk=ki yāṇṭu 15 Āvatu
perumānaṭikaḷ ś=rīUttamacoḻadevar taṅkaḷḷācciyār
pirān=takaṉmātevaṭikaḷā(r)rāṉa cempiyaṉmahādeviyār va
ṭakarai maḻaṉāṭṭu kiḷārkuṟṟattu miyakūṟṟu b=rah=madeyam ti
rumaṅkalattu ś=rīparaśurāmīś=varattudevark=ku śan=d=rātittaval niṟka
vaittaruḷiṉa tirunon=dāviḷak=ku Oṉṟuk=kum Uttaramaya
naśaṃkirān=tik=kum dakṣaṇamayanaśaṃkirān=tikkum cittirai
viṣuvum Appikaiviṣuvum ṉūṟṟeṭṭu kalaicam koṇ
ṭu tirumañcuṇapukavum vaittaruḷīṉa nilamāvaṉa Iv
vūr vaṭapulattu ś=rīcempiyaṉmahādevi vacakka
luk=ku kiḻpāṟkellai pirampurināllūr kaṇṭattum
mahen=t=ramaṅkalattum tirumaṅkalattu Ellaikkum
naṭuve vaṭakku nokkippoṉ Iṭṭeṟkku meṟkkum te
ṉpāṟkellai Ān=t=rayaṉ kumaraṉ viṣ=ṇuviṉ nilattukku vaṭa
kkum Ivaṉ nilattu[k*]ke meṟkkum teṉpāṟkellai kālāva
ṉ jātivetaṉinnuḷḷiṭṭār nilattukku vaṭakkum(m)i[p*]pāṟkel
lai kālāvaṉ kumaraṉ cuvāmi Uḷḷiṭṭār nilattukkum Ān=t=rayaṉ
ṉākan=nārāyaṇaṉ nilattukkum kiḻakkum In=nākaṉārāyaṇaṉ
nilattukkum cuṭukāṭṭukku vaṭakkum(m)i[p*]pāṟkellai
vaṭakku nokki poṉ vaḻikku kiḻakku Ipperuvaḻi[k*]ke teṟkku
m Āka In=naṭuvuppaṭṭa nilattuḷ Ivvūr Ān=t=rayaṉṉākan cuvāmi Uḷḷiṭṭār pa
kkal I[p*]pirān=takaṉmātevaṭikaḷā(r)rāṉa cempiyaṉmahādeviyār kuṭuttaru
ḷiṉa poṉ 12 kaḻañ=cu Ippoṉ paṉṉiru kaḻañcum kuṭuttu koṇṭa ni
lam Eṇmūḻakkolāl nūṟu kuḻi koṇṭatu Oru māvāka van=ta ni
lam Eḻu māvaraiyum muṉdevar tammuṭaiya nila(m)mum kuṭimakkaḷ
pakkal vilaikoṇṭanila(m)mum kuḷa(m)muḷpaṭa Āka nilam muve
liye mukkāle mākāṇiyum I[d*]devar nilam cuṭukāṭṭiṉṉiṉṟu
m vaṭakku nokki poṉ peruvaḻikku meṟkkum cuṭukāṭṭu[k*]ke vaṭakkum
ś=rīvāsudevaviṇṇakardevar nilattukku kiḻakkum Ān=t=rayaṉ ka
ṇṇaṉ comaṉ Uḷḷiṭṭār nilattukku teṟkkum Āka In=ta na/
ṭuvupaṭṭa nilam mūṉṟu mā mukkāṇiyum Āka kuḷattin kiḻ
viḷai nila[m*] nālveli I[n*]nā[l*]veli nilamum I[d*]devarite punce[y*] nila
m piramapurinallūr kaṇṭattu mahen=t=ramaṅkalattukkum tirumaṅka
lattukkum naṭuve kitan=ta Iṭṭeriṉ melai punce[y*] Eṇmūḻakolāl
kuḻi nānūṟṟuEṇpattunālaraiyum I[d*]devarite punce[y*] nila
m veḷḷi paṉaṃkāṭṭiṉa vaṭavākaṇṇaṉ neri punce[y*] kuḻi nūṟṟunā
ṟpattañcum ś=rīkoyiliṉ melpakkattu punce[y*] kuḻi muṉnūṟṟu
OṉṟeEṭṭu māvaraikkaṇiyum paṟaicceriyiṉ melpakkattu
pirānāṟṟaṃkāl kuḻi muppatu Āka kuḻi toḷāyirattuAṟupate mukkāle
mūṉṟu m[ā*]Araikkāṇiyāl nilam Araiyumāka cuṭṭappaṭṭa nilam I
[t*]taṉaiyilum muppatiraṇṭoṉṟum patiṉṉāṟoṉṟum E
ṭṭonṟumāka Iṟuppatāka Iccuṭṭappaṭṭa nilattukku Ellāttukkumā
ka I[t*]tirumaṅkalattu sabhaiyom Uṭaiyār pirān=takaṉmātevaṭikaḷārāṉa
cempiyan=mahādeviyāriṭai koṇṭa poṉ 50 kaḻañ=cu(cu)m I[d*]devaṟkku sa
bhaiyome muṉ kaṭavomā[y*] Irun=ta poṉ 63 kaḻañ=cu(cum)māka Ivvaṟupattu
mu[k*]kaḻañcu po[ṉ*]ṉum sabhaiyome koṇṭu Iccuṭṭa[p*]paṭṭa nilamit
taṉṉaiyum Iṟai nilattu yāṇṭu 15 Āvatu taimmutalāka Iṟaivāṭṭi
Iṟaiyili tevatāṉamāvatākavum In=nilam cuṭṭi van=ta Iṟaiyum me
ccoṟum vācalil pon=ta kuṭimaiyumaṟṟum Ūriṭu varippāṭum
mepper[p*]paṭṭatum sabhaiyome Iṟukka[k*]kaṭavomāka Ipparicoṭṭi
niban=dhaṃ ce[y*]tu paṇi paṇiṉāl paṇittu I[v*]vaṟupattumukkaḻa
ñcu pon=num kaiccellakkoṇṭu Itiṉāl van=ta palicai cekut[tu*]
śan=t=rātittaval Iccuṭṭa[p*]paṭṭa nilattukku Iṟai Iṟuttu kuṭukka[k- ka*]ṭavomāka I
[p*]paricoṭṭi niban=dhaṃ ce[y*]tu kuṭuttom ś=rīparaśurāmīś=varattu devaṟku ti
rumaṅkalattu sabhaiyom I[n*]niban=dhaṃ mahāsabhaiyā[r*] rakṣai pan=māyeś=vara
rakṣai [||*]
This edition by Nicolas Cane (2024), based on autopsy, photographs, and published visual documentation.
